Key Match Events: Saurabh Netravalkar sent back Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma in his first two overs against India
Anrich Nortje is the joint-second-highest wicket-taker in the tournament with nine wickets
Pre-Game Insights: Unbeaten South Africa in front as USA hope for more magic
USA, in their first T20 World Cup appearance, are now A2, and will kickstart the Super Eight stage against South Africa
South Africa are entering the Super Eight stage with an all-win record
USA showed their batting muscle in the opening game against Canada, and then restricted Pakistan to a middling total in the second game
The likes of Aaron Jones, Saurabh Netravalkar and Monank Patel have shown they belong to this level of cricket
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa captain Aiden Markram hopes for better batting conditions in West Indies
Aaron Jones is expecting good support for USA in Antigua
Miscellaneous Highlights: It is expected to be an overcast morning in North Sound, but there is no rain forecast in the area on Wednesday
Nortje has picked up eight wickets in the middle phase, the second-highest after Adam Zampa's nine
USA have the highest run rate against spin of all the teams in the tournament - 11.04
South Africa have the second-best death-overs economy in this tournament - 5.27
This will be the first T20I between the two sides
